Package Classes

Class FileHandler

java.lang.Object
Classes.FileHandler
public class FileHandler
extends java.lang.Object
FileHandler class that handles the files associated with the tree.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private byte[] buffer
    Byte array variable where we store everything we read from the file.
    private int counter
    Variable that holds the number of counts in every test.
    private java.io.RandomAccessFile data
    Data file where the values associated with the keys in the B+ree.
    private int data_file_size
    The size in bytes of every record in the data file.
    private int dataByteOffset
    Offset between every value in the data file.
    private int dataPage_size
    Size in bytes of total bytes containing the information of the node.
    private java.io.RandomAccessFile index
    Index file where the B+tree nodes are stored.
    private int info_size
    Size in bytes of every value that holds information about the node.
    private int key_size
    Size in bytes of a key stored in the B+Tree.
    private int key_value_offset
    Offset in bytes between key and corresponding value.
    private static int nextPage
    Value that holds the next page index value.
    private int page_size
    Size in bytes of a page where a node of the B+tree will be stored.
    private int rec_size
    Size in bytes of key + value.
    private int totalRecs
    Variable that holds the total number of records the tree has.
    (package private) java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.Integer,​BTreeNode> toUpdate
    hashTable that holds pages that have been changed.

  • Constructor Details

    • FileHandler

      public FileHandler​(int page_size, int info_size, int rec_size_index, int rec_size_data, int key_size, int dataPage_size, int key_value_offset, java.io.RandomAccessFile index, java.io.RandomAccessFile data)
      Constructor for the fileHandler.
      Parameters:
      page_size - Size in bytes of every page representing a node.
      info_size - Size in bytes of the value that holds information about the node.
      rec_size_index - Size in byte of a key and its associated value.
      rec_size_data - Size in byte of a value in the data file.
      key_size - Size in byte of key stored in the node.
      dataPage_size - Size in byte of all the values containing the 4information of the node.
      key_value_offset - Offset between a key and its corresponding value.
      index - The index file containing the nodes.
      data - The data file containing the values associated with the keys.

  • Method Details

    • getData

      public int getData​(int position)
      Method for getting a value from the data file.
      Parameters:
      position - The position from where we will read the value.
      Returns:
      Returning the value we got from the file.

    • getNode

      public BTreeNode getNode​(int page)
      Method for getting a B+Tree node from the file.
      Parameters:
      page - The page of the node we want to retrieve.
      Returns:
      Returning the node we got from the file.

    • getNextPage

      public int getNextPage()
      Getter for getting the next page to create a BTreeNode.
      Returns:
      The next available page and then adding 1 to it.

    • getOffset

      public int getOffset()
      Getter for the byte offset where we store a value corresponding to a key.
      Returns:
      Returning the byte offset of the next data value.

    • getToUpdate

      public java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.Integer,​BTreeNode> getToUpdate()
      Getter for the hashtable object.
      Returns:
      Returning the hashtable associated with the hashTable.

      Method for increasing the number of records we go in B+Tree.

      public byte[] readBlock​(java.io.RandomAccessFile file, int position)
      Method for reading a block of bytes from the file.
      Parameters:
      file - The file from which we are retrieving the block of bytes.
      position - The position in the file from where we are retrieving the block of bytes.
      Returns:
      Returning a byte array containing the block of bytes.

    • writeBlock

      public void writeBlock​(java.io.RandomAccessFile file, byte[] buffer, int position)
      Method for writing a block of byte to a file.
      Parameters:
      file - The file in which we are writing the block of bytes.
      buffer - The byte array that contains the information we want to write.
      position - The position in the file where we are going to write the block of bytes.

      Method for writing data to the Data file.

      value - The value we are writing to the file.
